text: Marburn Academy is a non-profit independent day school for students in grades 2–12 school in New Albany, Ohio. The school was created in 1981 as an alternative for gifted students who have ADHD or dyslexia. The school is one of 13 accredited Orton-Gillingham schools in the United States. In January 2017, Marburn Academy moved from Forest Park East, Columbus, to a new location at 9555 Johnstown Road, New Albany, Ohio 43054. == References == == External links == * *Academy of Orton-Gillingham Practitioners and Educators Category:Private schools in Ohio Category:Preparatory schools in Ohio Category:Alternative schools Category:Educational institutions established in 1981
